ModMetaData.name: Disco!
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a disco floor and a disco event to the game. Research Electricity to unlock dance floors and the DJ Stand: you will need both to run a disco. Once built, wait for a disco to trigger naturally or trigger the disco by selecting the DJ stand.
You can add custom songs through the mod settings menu.
